summary: IT STATRED OUT THE CAR LOST POWER AN WENT 5MLS AN HOUR. I THUGAHT THE TRAINNY HAD GONE BUT TURNED OUT NO!! I CALLED THE DEALER I GOT IT FROM SAID HE WAS SURE IT WAS THE THROATLE BODY AS IT WAS STILL MOVEING. TOLD ME TO TURN IT ON AN OFF TRI TO RESET IT AN SO I DID AN YES IT DID THE 1ST TIME BUT AFTER THAT IT TOOK OFF GOING 80 REFUSED TO STOP I HAD TO LITTERLY PUSH ALL BRAKES ON AN PULL THE KEY TO GET IT TO STOP.. WHEN I CALLED FORD MOTOR COMPANY THE LADY 1ST GOT WAS POLIT TOOK THE INFO BUT PHONE DIS COUNCTED THE NEXT WOME I GOT WAS RUD AN UGLY SAID THIS WAS MY OWN PROBLY DISPIT THIS BEING A 2015 AN ONLY HAVEINE THE VEHCLE LESS THEN 6MONTHS.. IM VERY DISPOINTED IN FORD IF MY KIDS AN I HAD BEEN HURT WOW
